short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check for Country of Origin or manufacturer of any amazon.in product. Shows label besides the title of product page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to know from where this product on amazon manufactured or originated from?

it's way more easier to spot the Country of Origin just beside the title so that you know if you're buying and helping your beloved country's economy or not. No need to scroll down and go to product information and read from tiny subtexts, the information you need is just in front of you!
